description: NTS Map: 082J11A great array of trails, you can mix 'n match sections to suit your groups abilities and make it as flat/hilly and long/short as you want. Great signage and access throughout the area. As well, the PLP Visitors Center features a great display area with stuffed Mountain Lion, Big Horn Sheep, Griz & few other critters.Click Here  for snow and trail grooming conditions.There are a brazillian other trails in the same area.
directions: Go 49.7km S of TransCanada #1 on Hiway 40 and turn west into the PLP. Between ~Dec 15 and June 15 hiway 40 is closed at the turn so it is very easy to find. For this section of trails, once you turn off #40, drive 2.2 km and keep to the left. Drive another 3.7km to the Elkwood (Amphitheater) Parking lot.
title: Peter Lougheed Park - Lodgepole - Sinclair - Meadow
